Return information related to Mendelian Randomisation

mr.Rd

Return information related to Mendelian Randomisation

mr(exposure = NULL, outcome = NULL, pval_threshold = 1e-05,
  mode = c("table", "raw"))

Arguments

exposure

A trait name, eg. "Body mass index", leaving exposure as NULL will return MR information related to a specific outcome. NOTE: exposure and outcome cannot be both NULL.
outcome

A trait name, eg. "Coronary heart disease", leaving outcome as NULL will return MR information related to a specific exposure. NOTE: exposure and outcome cannot be both NULL.
pval_threshold

P-value threshold for the MR evidence.
mode

If mode = "table", returns a data frame (a tibble as per tidyverse convention). If mode = "raw", returns a raw response from EpiGraphDB API with minimal parsing done by httr.

Examples

# Returns a data frame
mr(exposure = "Body mass index", outcome = "Coronary heart disease")
#> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8.
#> # A tibble: 1 x 5
#>   exposure        outcome                estimate     se             p
#>   <chr>           <chr>                     <dbl>  <dbl>         <dbl>
#> 1 Body mass index Coronary heart disease    0.450 0.0651 0.00000000117

# Returns raw response
mr(
  exposure = "Body mass index", outcome = "Coronary heart disease",
  mode = "raw"
) %>% str()
#> List of 2
#>  $ query  : chr "MATCH (t1:Gwas)-[r:MR]->(t2:Gwas) WHERE t1.trait = \"Body mass index\" AND t2.trait = \"Coronary heart disease\"| __truncated__
#>  $ results:List of 1
#>   ..$ :List of 5
#>   .. ..$ exposure: chr "Body mass index"
#>   .. ..$ outcome : chr "Coronary heart disease"
#>   .. ..$ estimate: num 0.45
#>   .. ..$ se      : num 0.0651
#>   .. ..$ p       : num 1.17e-09

# Use a different threshold
mr(exposure = "Body mass index", pval_threshold = 1e-8)
#> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8.
#> # A tibble: 21 x 5
#>    exposure        outcome                 estimate     se        p
#>    <chr>           <chr>                      <dbl>  <dbl>    <dbl>
#>  1 Body mass index Body fat                   0.631 0.0339 1.53e-77
#>  2 Body mass index Waist circumference        0.871 0.0166 1.17e-62
#>  3 Body mass index Obesity class 1            2.53  0.0485 1.91e-62
#>  4 Body mass index Hip circumference          0.856 0.0186 2.24e-58
#>  5 Body mass index Waist-to-hip ratio         0.474 0.0121 5.11e-53
#>  6 Body mass index Obesity class 2            3.36  0.101  5.11e-48
#>  7 Body mass index Obesity class 3            3.97  0.277  1.38e-46
#>  8 Body mass index Childhood obesity          2.48  0.0878 2.44e-41
#>  9 Body mass index Fasting insulin            0.181 0.0111 8.10e-27
#> 10 Body mass index Extreme body mass index    3.90  0.273  5.71e-23
#> # … with 11 more rows
